titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States respecting the right to decent, safe, sanitary, and affordable housing.

bill.summary: 2/14/2011--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - States that all U.S. citizens shall have a right to decent, safe, sanitary, and affordable housing.
